content: easy hamster pattern using basic crochet stitches in us terminology in pdf 2 pages finished hamster is ~3 8-4 inches tall using 3 5 mm and 2 25 mm hooks **difficulty** easy **stitches used ** * chain - chain * single_crochet - single_crochet * double_crochet - double_crochet * tc - triple crochet * increase - 2 single_crochet together * decrease - invisible decrease single_crochet * slip_stitch - slip_stitch **materials ** * hooks 2 25mm & 3 5mm * 2 color yarns worsted or aran i used loops & threads impeccable aran and soft taupe but others colors would be great too * scissors tapestry needle * polyfill * safety eyes 8 mm and nose 11 mm alternatively these can be embroidered consider adding paws if you want or making the first 2 rounds of the arms in another color
